values: well its time for an update since i havnt in forever, anyway, what the frik is up everyone!?! ill probably be getting back into this whole thing again...
so i found this sweet program that lets you make your own people and this is my master peice, i call him "The Flamer".

So last night was pretty sweet, we had a bon fire at Erica's and a bunch of people came which was sweet, cuz we all got to hang and stuff. Today in drivers ed was awsome cuz out car is the frikin best, me, josh, jamie, and shultze, and we never shutup. While iw as driving , josh and jamie and shultze were in the back and shultze said somethin stupid to me, so i rolled down their windows and locked them goin 55 down the road, so i could " tune them out ", yeah it was pretty wicked, and then shultze had some pretty awsome bird sound that scared the crap out of me and was frikin hilarious Then josh, jamie, shultze and i went to CJ's and got some grub, and then went to josh's to watch a movie, then i had a soccer game tonight which we won but i got stuck in goal which sucked. Any way, i godda go to work at 7:30 in the morning tommarow, so.....have...fun,

 

oh yeah, and how come on these little mood faces that you can add to your entry, why dont they have a retarded mood? someone look into that..

so today was pretty sweet, drivers ed in the morning and afternoon with all my friends is awsome, josh is the best driver considering he hasnt ever driven once before today, so sittin in the back seat while he drove proved to be one of the most exciting moments ever. Then josh and jamie and i went out to cjs afterwards and had some grub, good eatins there is. Then class was pretty amusing but i dont realy remember what the teacher was talking about but turing pictures of people in our books into ninjas and cartoon characters with phil was pretty sweet, and makin fun of maries obsession with the word, package, yeah its all pretty sweet...

So.....drivers ed started monday which is pretty sweet, cuz i get to see all my friends and hang out with them for like 2 hours, and then drive with them. My driving group rocks, me, josh, jamie, and shultze, it was suppose to be like me, marie, tyler, and jamie, but marie and tyler had to switch cuz it was easier for their scedual or somethin, anyway yeah so thats gunna be pretty kewl. Iv been working at the Vets and thats realy sweet, and i get to play soccer 3 nights a week, so my weeks are pretty busy but its kewl, i got everything in them that i want, anyway, i just havnt updated much for a long time, but ill be writing in this alot more now, please feel free to comment to help me get back in the groove of this.....

"For You To Notice"

I'm starting to fashion an idea in my head
Where I would impress you with every single word I said
It would come out insightful,
or brave,
or smooth,
or charming
And you'd want to call me

And I would be there every time you need me
I'd be there every time

But for now I'll look so longingly waiting
for you to want me,
for you to need me,
for you to notice me.

I'm starting to fashion an idea in my head
Where I would impress you with every single word I said
It would come out insightful,
or brave,
or smooth,
or charming
And you'd want to call me

And I would be there every time you need me
I'd be there every time

But for now I'll look so longingly waiting
for you to want me,
for you to need me,
for you to notice me.

Take me away

Give me wings to fly
fly me to the highest cloud.
Long lost hopes of a dream never to come true
are all i ever think about
Take me away.
Hit after Hit my heart cant take it anymore.
When will this end,
when will everything be alright.
Ready to walk away,
ready to give up.
Hope draws thin.
Hope is nothing but a flickering flame of a candle.
Feelings go haywire,
Thrown about like dust in the wind.
No more pain.
Tell me there will be no more pain.
I need to hear it.
Fill me up with your grace.
Take me in and hold me tight.
And take me away.

-Rob Blakely

so this is the first time iv updated in quite a few months, theres alot goin on right now, i got a job at the Vets which i enjoy doing, soccer is doin pretty good, my mural is turning out pretty good, if anyone has any ideas or wants to add somethin to it be my guest cuz im almost out of ideas. Any way, i guess im gunna start writing in this more, no one looks at mine anymore anyway, but maybe they will
Hi, Im Rob, Who wants to be my Valentine?

So last night was realy sweet, Nate and I and Ben, shot random things such as, pennies, nickles, dimes, quarters, balls of gum, peanuts, creme savers, and metal balls at a pyramid of old pop cans that were put on nates wooden driveway railing thing. It was sweet, and we bought some tennis balls and threw them at eachother and hit them with peices of wood from nates fireplace, and we played crotch ball which, may i say, is a very retarded thing to do, unless your incredibly bored, then its pretty much the most amazing game. Can you belive that family dollar and cvs both dont sell whiffel balls and whiffel ball bats? i mean come on....
